title: Iceland evacuates Blue Lagoon amid volcano eruption
description: Lava has begun flowing from a volcano near Iceland's capital, after authorities began evacuating nearby communities. The meteorological office said an eruption is underway after previously warning of the threat. A volcano in southwest Iceland has started spew…
content:
A volcano in southwest Iceland has started spewing lava in the eighth eruption to hit the region since the end of 2023.
